completions.nl_description: Replace some G objects with B, Y, or C depending on the context within the row.
Recolor all objects of color G, to the color of the nearest adjacent object.
Recolor object neighbors of color G to the color of the row ends.
Recolor the immediate neighbor objects of color G to the color of their neighbor objects.
Recolor all neighboring objects of color G to match the color of the corner objects.
Change the color of objects G to the color of the neighbor objects.
Move objects of color G one step right and recolor them to the color of the 2 objects adjacent to them (excluding the neighboring G objects).
Update the color of objects of color G to match the color of the neighboring objects.
Recolor objects of color G to the color of their horizontal neighbor, if they are neighbors.
Recolor the neighboring objects of color G to the color of the closest boundary edge.
Recolor all objects of color G to the color of the objects they are neighbors of.
Recolor the objects previously colored G to the color of the object in their top-left corner.
Recolor objects that are neighbors to the large border objects with the color of the border objects.
Recolor all green objects to the color of their nearest neighboring object.
Recolor the objects neighboring the vertical bars to the left with the color of the bars
completions.code: (do (rule (vars (this other)) (filter (and (neighbor_of this other) (color_equals (color_of other) B))) (apply (update_color B))) (rule (vars (this other)) (filter (and (neighbor_of this other) (color_equals (color_of other) Y))) (apply (update_color Y))) (rule (vars (this other)) (filter (and (neighbor_of this other) (color_equals (color_of other) C))) (apply (update_color C))))

completions.nl_description: Change the colors of green objects to match the colors of the nearest vertical border object above them.
Move all objects of color G one step to their nearest object of color B, A, or W, respectively, and then recolor them to the color of the object they moved towards.
Recolor all objects of size 1 to color of column equal to even to color of the neighbor object.
Change color of objects initially colored G to match the color of their respective neighboring objects.
Recolor all objects of color G to the color of the nearest boundary object.
Recolor the G objects to B if they are in the same rows as the B objects and to R if they are in the same rows as the R objects.
Recolor all the green objects to the color that exists the most in the grid.
Recolor the neighbors of each object of color G, and the objects of color G, to match the color of the nearest object in the same row or column.
Recolor all objects of color G that are neighbor to objects on the edges, changing them to the respective edge color.
Recolor all objects of color G, differently in each pair of images.
Recolor all objects to a color similar to their neighbors in the same position.
Recolor the objects of color G to colors B, Y, or C, depending on the overall color pattern of the grid.
Recolor object G to match the bordering object in the same column.
Recolor all objects of color G to the color of the objects they are neighbors of, and then recolor them according to their new neighbors in subsequent iterations.
Recolor all objects of color G to the color of the object that they are neighbors of.
Move all objects of color other than G, towards the object of color G, if they are neighbors of it and then change their color to match the object's color.
Move all G objects toward the boundaries and recolor them to the color of the objects at the boundaries they are moving toward.
Recolor all objects of color G to a new color that is indicated by the colors bordering them.
Recolor all objects of color G and shape 'enclosed' to a specific color.
Recolor all G objects. Change the center and bottom color to B.
Move the objects of color G, one step to the right, and recolor them to an alternate color from the same image row.
Recolor green objects neighboring other color objects to the same color as the neighboring objects
Change the color of objects adjacent to the largest object of color B to their own color
Recolor all objects of color G to the color of the objects they are neighbors with.
Recolor the neighbors of green objects to the same color as the opposite edge.
Recolor all objects of color G to the color of the bordering object, if they are neighbors.
Recolor all 'G' objects to match the color of their left neighbor.
Recolor all objects of color G to match the color of their closest neighbor.
Recolor all objects to the color of the vertical border they are next to.
Move all objects of color different than G, toward the object of color G, if they are neighbors of it.
Recolor objects of color G to match the color of their neighboring objects.
Change the color of all F letter objects to color B
Recolor the nearest neighbor of each 'G' object to the color of 'G'.
Change the color of the neighbors of red objects to match either the respective blue or yellow object in the grid.
Recolor the objects that are neighbours to the objects of color R to color B in the first pair, A in the second pair, and W in the third pair.
Recolor all green objects to match the column color.
Recolor all green objects to match the color of the neighboring objects that border them horizontally and vertically.
Update the color of the green objects to the color of the objects neighboring them.
Change color of objects neighboring an object with the same original color while ignoring the outer border objects with Y or W.
Recolor all objects of color G to the color of the nearest border objects.
Recolor all objects of color G to the color of the objects nearest to them from the four sides (up, down, left, right).
Recolor the neighboring objects of color G to the color that matches the top non-G object in their respective columns.
Recolor all green objects to the color of the neighboring object they are closest to.
Recolor all objects to the color of their vertical neighbor
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this other))
        (filter (neighbor_of this other))
        (apply (update_color (color_of other)))
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Recolor all objects of color G to the color of the object's neighboring to the right.
Recolor all objects of color G with their neighboring object color if they are neighbors.
Recolor objects of color G if there is an object of color R in the first pair, Y in the second pair, or C in the third pair in the same row.
Recolor each instance of G that is a neighbor of B to B, recolor each instance of G that is a neighbor of Y to Y, and recolor each instance of G that is a neighbor of C to C.
Recolor all the neighbors of objects of color G to match the color of G.
Recolor all objects of color G to the color of their neighboring object, if any.
Recolor all blue objects to B if they are neighbors of a green object
Recolor all objects of color G to the color of the neighboring object if they are neighbors.
Recolor objects of color G to the color of their vertical neighbor objects.
Recolor all objects of color G to color matching the color on their bottom on neighbor columns, moving vertically.
Move the enclosed object vertically up and downward simultaneously
Update the color of the objects near the border to the color of the objects they are next to.
Recolor all objects of color G to the color of the nearest border object in their direction.
Switch the color of objects that are neighbors to the primary diagonal object they are close to.
Recolor objects that are initially green to match the color of their neighboring object they are closest to.
Recolor all objects of color different than B and R, to color B and objects of color G to color of border of each G group.
Recolor objects of color G to the color of their neighboring objects.
Recolor all 'G' objects using the color of the nearest vertical edge objects.
For all objects colored G, change their color to the color of the row's edge object.
Recolor all objects of size 1 to the color of the neighboring vertical column.
Recolor any green object that is neighbor to a red, yellow, or brown object.
Recolor the objects of color G that are neighbors of objects of color B, Y, or W, to the color of the neighbor object.
Update the color of objects that are neighbors to green objects to the color of the green object.
Recolor objects of color G to the color of each of their neighboring objects on the same row.
Each 'G' is recolored based on the object at the same column and nearest to it. From top to bottom, the new colors are: R, B, Y, A, W.
Recolor objects to match the color of the first occurrence of the same size in the same row.
Recolor all G objects that are in the same column as a B object to B, all G objects that are in the same column as a R object to R, and all G objects that are in the same column as a Y object to Y.
Recolor all objects of color G to the same color as the largest neighboring objects.
Change the colors of objects to the color of the neighboring object of maximum size.
Recolor all objects of color G to the color of the closest object in the same row.
Change the color of objects that intersect with other objects to the color of the other object.
Recolor all objects of color G to the color of the edge object they are closest to in the grid.
Recolor all objects of color G, to the color of their neighboring objects.
Move all objects of color G one step toward the color of the surrounding objects if they are neighbors, and then recolor them to match the first surrounding color encountered.
Recolor objects of color G to match the colors of their neighboring objects.
Move all objects of size 1 that are in the same column as an object of color, to the column of the colored object, and recolor them to the color of the object.
Recolor the objects adjacent to B on the left to B and the objects adjacent to G on the both sides to Y.
Recolor all green objects to the color of their bordering object.
Change the color of the neighbor objects of color G to the color of their neighbor object.
Recolor the objects in the center (one step away from the border) with the color of the border object neighbor.
Recolor all objects initially colored G to match the color of their neighbors.
